/Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin/c++  -arch arm64 -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.1.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names CMakeFiles/code03_dessin.dir/Cours1/code03_dessin.cpp.o CMakeFiles/code03_dessin.dir/Common/shaders_utilities.cpp.o -o code03_dessin   -L/usr/local/lib  -L/opt/homebrew/lib  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib -Wl,-rpath,/opt/homebrew/lib -framework OpenGL -framework OpenGL -lGLEW -lglfw -lpthread
